info.description: Retrieves reports on treasury transactions across different products
info.title: API to retrieve various reports on treasury transactions

get.summary: Retrieves the realized and unrealised mark to market details
get.description: Retrieves the realized and unrealised mark to market details(profit/loss) displayed according to the configuration done by the institution

parameters.name: dealer
parameters.description: The dealer/desk responsible for monitoring and managing the currency position

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the group

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

get.summary: Retrieves the position details for all the currencies in different calenders
get.description: Retrieves the position details(long/short) for all the currencies in different calenders

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Indicates the type of currency to which the account belongs

parameters.name: company
parameters.description: The company code

parameters.name: positionType
parameters.description: Identifies the position type. Possible values are CAS(cash position), GAP(Interest mismatch position), FXP(Foreign exchange position)

parameters.name: dealerDesk
parameters.description: The dealer/desk responsible for monitoring and managing the currency positions.

parameters.name: valueDate
parameters.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

parameters.name: valueDateFrom
parameters.description: Contains the from value of value date to be specified in a range.

parameters.name: valueDateTo
parameters.description: Contains the to value of value date to be specified in a range.

parameters.name: dealDate
parameters.description: Date on which the deal was agreed.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Indicates spread of time buckets.Ex: 3M,6M,9M,10Y etc.

parameters.name: calendar
parameters.description: Identifies the calendar to be used for the spreading of different position data into different time buckets. Ex: CAL-Standard calendar and DE1-Deutsche calendar

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

get.description: Retrieves details on all open deals across various treasury products

parameters.name: contractId
parameters.description: Identifies the unique identifier of the transaction or contract.

parameters.name: counterpartyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the counter party

parameters.name: counterpartyName
parameters.description: The counterparty name for the forex deal.

parameters.name: dealType
parameters.description: Foreign Exchange deal type. Allowed values: - SP(spot) - FW(forward) - SW(Swap)

parameters.name: dealSubType
parameters.description: Under a deal type, there can be further sub deal types. E.g. Broker and Internal are sub deal types for FX spot and forward deal types.

parameters.name: buyAmount
parameters.description: Amount bought in the FX deal.

parameters.name: buyAmountFrom
parameters.description: Contains the from value of buy amount to be specified in a range.

parameters.name: buyAmountTo
parameters.description: Contains the to value of buy amount to be specified in a range.

parameters.name: buyCurrency
parameters.description: ISO Currency code for the bought currency.

parameters.name: buyRate
parameters.description: The exchange rate at which is currency is bought.

parameters.name: buyRateFrom
parameters.description: Contains the from value of buy rate to be specified in a range.

parameters.name: buyRateTo
parameters.description: Contains the to value of buy rate to be specified in a range.

parameters.name: sellAmount
parameters.description: Amount sold in the FX deal.

parameters.name: sellAmountFrom
parameters.description: Contains the from value of sell amount to be specified in a range.

parameters.name: sellAmountTo
parameters.description: Contains the to value of sell amount to be specified in a range.

parameters.name: sellCurrency
parameters.description: ISO Currency code for the sold currency.

parameters.name: sellRate
parameters.description: The exchange rate at which is currency is sold.

parameters.name: sellRateFrom
parameters.description: Contains the from value of sell rate to be specified in a range.

parameters.name: sellRateTo
parameters.description: Contains the to value of sell rate to be specified in a range.

parameters.name: valueDate
parameters.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

parameters.name: valueDateFrom
parameters.description: Contains the from value of value date to be specified in a range.

parameters.name: valueDateTo
parameters.description: Contains the to value of value date to be specified in a range.

parameters.name: reutersDealId
parameters.description: The Reuters deal reference number, if the deal is booked on Reuters dealing platform.

parameters.name: maturityDate
parameters.description: Indicates maturity date of the contract

parameters.name: maturityDateFrom
parameters.description: Contains the from value of maturity date to be specified in a range.

parameters.name: maturityDateTo
parameters.description: Contains the to value of maturity date to be specified in a range.

parameters.name: dealDate
parameters.description: Date on which the deal was agreed.

parameters.name: dealDateFrom
parameters.description: Date on which the deal was agreed.

parameters.name: dealDateTo
parameters.description: Date on which the deal was agreed.

parameters.name: instrument
parameters.description: The instrument identifier

parameters.name: issuedBy
parameters.description: The issuer of a security or a bond.

parameters.name: portfolio
parameters.description: Id of the portfolio (security account), which the arrangement (account, deposit, loan, etc.) is attached to.

parameters.name: depository
parameters.description: The custodian where securities are held

parameters.name: inputter
parameters.description: The user identifier who input the transaction

parameters.name: broker
parameters.description: Specifies the counterparty with whom the trade is to be effected.

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: A pricing plan can be applied to an account, the selection is automatic or manual

parameters.name: dealerDesk
parameters.description: The dealer/desk responsible for monitoring and managing the currency positions.

parameters.name: internalDealerDesk
parameters.description: One of the dealer/desk for an internal deal between two dealer/desks.

parameters.name: displayName
parameters.description: Name used for display or enrichment purposes

parameters.name: orderStatus
parameters.description: Status of the order.

parameters.name: buyOrSell
parameters.description: Whether the transaction is a buy or a sell.

parameters.name: recordStatus
parameters.description: General status of the record. Possible values: - null - authorised - IHLD - input, on hold - INAU - input, not authorised - INA2 - input, authorised, pending second authorisation - INAO - input, not authorised with blocking overrides - RNAU - reversed, not authorised - RNAO - reversed, not authorised with blocking overrides

parameters.name: contractStatus
parameters.description: Status of the contract, e.g. open, matured or liquidated.

parameters.name: dateTime
parameters.description: Date and time separated by '-'

parameters.name: dateTimeFrom
parameters.description: Contains the from value of date and time to be specified in a range.

parameters.name: dateTimeTo
parameters.description: Contains the to value of date and time to be specified in a range.

parameters.name: fixingExerciseDate
parameters.description: Fixing or Exercise Date for FRA deal.

parameters.name: fixingExerciseDateFrom
parameters.description: Contains the from value of fixing or exercise date to be specified in a range.

parameters.name: fixingExerciseDateTo
parameters.description: Contains the to value of fixing or exercise date to be specified in a range.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

groupName.description: The name that is displayed for the group

dealerId.description: Identifies the dealer/ desk responsible for monitoring and managing currency positions.

yearToMonth.description: Period represented by the beginning of the year till previous month end.

monthToDate.description: The calculated value for the period  from the first of the month till current date.

yearToDate.description: The calculated value for the period  from the beginning of the year till current date.

unrealizedMarkToMarket.description: The amount of unrealised profit and loss calculated as a result of mark to market revaluation

totalYearToDate.description: Total for the period since the start of the year till date.

totalYearToDateRevalCurrency.description: Total for the period since the start of the year till date expressed in revaluation currency.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

calendarPeriod.description: The calendar period used for consolidating the data into different time buckets.

netPosition.description: Net of buy and sell positions.

unrealizedMarkToMarket.description: The amount of unrealised profit and loss calculated as a result of mark to market revaluation

netPositionCurrency.description: The currency in which a net position value is expressed.

unrealizedMarkToMarketCurrency.description: Currency in which the unrealised profit & Loss is expressed.

counterpartyId.description: The identifier of the counter party

counterpartyName.description: The counterparty name for the forex deal.

dealType.description: Foreign Exchange deal type. Allowed values: - SP(spot) - FW(forward) - SW(Swap)

dealSubType.description: Under a deal type, there can be further sub deal types. E.g. Broker and Internal are sub deal types for FX spot and forward deal types.

buyAmount.description: Amount bought in the FX deal.

buyCurrency.description: ISO Currency code for the bought currency.

buyRate.description: The exchange rate at which is currency is bought.

sellAmount.description: Amount sold in the FX deal.

sellCurrency.description: ISO Currency code for the sold currency.

sellRate.description: The exchange rate at which is currency is sold.

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

reutersDealId.description: The Reuters deal reference number, if the deal is booked on Reuters dealing platform.

maturityDate.description: Indicates maturity date of the contract

dealDate.description: Date on which the deal was agreed.

issuedBy.description: The issuer of a security or a bond.

portfolio.description: Id of the portfolio (security account), which the arrangement (account, deposit, loan, etc.) is attached to.

depository.description: The custodian where securities are held

inputter.description: The user identifier who input the transaction

broker.description: Specifies the counterparty with whom the trade is to be effected.

method.description: A pricing plan can be applied to an account, the selection is automatic or manual

dealerDesk.description: The dealer/desk responsible for monitoring and managing the currency positions.

internalDealerDesk.description: One of the dealer/desk for an internal deal between two dealer/desks.

displayName.description: Name used for display or enrichment purposes

buyOrSell.description: Whether the transaction is a buy or a sell.

recordStatus.description: General status of the record. Possible values: - null - authorised - IHLD - input, on hold - INAU - input, not authorised - INA2 - input, authorised, pending second authorisation - INAO - input, not authorised with blocking overrides - RNAU - reversed, not authorised - RNAO - reversed, not authorised with blocking overrides

contractStatus.description: Status of the contract, e.g. open, matured or liquidated.

fixingExerciseDate.description: Fixing or Exercise Date for FRA deal.
